name: Requiem - You Aren't the Hero Anymore
name_original: Requiem - You Aren't the Hero Anymore
description:
Requiem - You aren't the Hero Anymore is a musical game where you sing a requiem to appease restless souls of past heroes. Harmonize your requiem with the hero's soul.

Hints
  • The game gives scores based on harmony of voices sung.
  • Hold the button to prolong the singing voice
  • Every time you completely fill up the... 
    • green (harmony) bar, you gain 10 points
    • red (tension) bar, you lose 5 points
  • For start and end, you can press any key combinations listed.
  • For leap up and leap down, there are multiple possible key combinations, but may not sound (or harmonize) the best.
Button Controls Basic Keys
  • L - repeats the previous sung note
  • J - melody pitch goes higher
  • K - melody pitch goes lower
Modifier Keys
  • By combining the following modifiers with button J or K, the melody will jump up/down even further. (sorted by the boost)
    • D (boost the least)
    • S
    • A
    • Shift + D
    • Shift + S
    • Shift + A   (boost the most)
  • Example: 
    • Pressing S + J will cause the melody pitch to go higher than D + J

 

Web Version Browser Compatibility Tested and Working
  • Chrome on Windows (64-bits), version 60
Reported NOT Working
  • Firefox (unknown OS, unknown Version)
